GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
bpf: Fix KASAN use-after-free Read in compute_effective_progs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 1f8ca9c40e6222ce431e9ba5dae3cccce8ef9443, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit af6eea57437a830293eab56246b6025cc7d46ee7. For more details please see the references link.
